text: Ndithudi! Muchilengedwe chakumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndiponso mukasinthidwe ka usiku ndi usana, ndi mâ€™zombo zimene zimayenda pa nyanja zitanyamula katundu wothandiza anthu, ndi mvula imene Mulungu amagwetsa kuchokera ku mitambo ndipo imaukitsa nthaka imene idali yakufa, ndi mayendedwe a nyama zosiyanasiyana zimene Iye amazimwanza pa dziko lapansi; ndiponso mphepo ndi mitambo imene imakhala pakati pa kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi, ndithudi mu zimenezi muli zizindikiro kwa anthu anzeru
